content.raw:
Team owltonomous, we’re running some quick tests as a sanity check and I noticed that your team Docker image exits right away after executing `docker run ...` . I’m testing with the stationkeeping task.

‌

```
caguero@frost:~/vrx-docker$ docker ps -a
CONTAINER ID        IMAGE                                                   COMMAND                  CREATED             STATUS                     PORTS               NAMES
2bf3e57a44dd        ohnoyoufoundmycode/owltonomous-vrx:vrx-phase2-updated   "/ros_entrypoint.sh …"   4 minutes ago       Exited (0) 4 minutes ago                       vrx-competitor-system
e5b3a2593cca        vrx-server-melodic-nvidia:latest                        "/vrx_entrypoint.sh …"   4 minutes ago       Up 4 minutes               11345/tcp           vrx-server-system
```

Is your image supposed to automatically execute your entry point?
